attributes.action: The SNP need to recognize the 40% of Scottish voter's who voted to leave the EU.
attributes.background: The SNP seem to disregarded the views of 40% of Scottish voter's who  wish to leave the EU. The leadership of the SNP need to recognize that Scotland voted as part of the UK and need to accept the result and help to achieve the best outcome for the UK.

rejection.details:
This petition is calling on the SNP, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action. 

If you'd like the Scottish Government to take action, you may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
